channel.title: Anyone for Synthfest France (Nantes 7 9 june 2019)?
channel.description:
Hi everyone,
I will be at the Synthfest France 2019 (Nantes friday 7 to sunday 9 june). I will bring some axoloti based stuff.
There will be a lot of great vintage synths on display : modular synths, analog synths and early digital synths (fairlight CMI II with Zoolook samples demos !)
Does other axoloti enthusiast plan to come.
https://www.synthfestfrance.com/
See you there ;-)

item.title: Anyone for Synthfest France (Nantes 7 9 june 2019)?
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

It will be great to see some axoloti users and creators there

Note: i will have a little stand/booth in the main room.
I'll be present all three days.

See you there

I will display 4 or 5 axolosynths.
Among them, there will be this 12 key synth, based on a variant of the circular Shepard scale.

And a retro-digital synth with hard sync capabilities, the "Fria"

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone for Synthfest France (Nantes 7 9 june 2019)?
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

The patch is quite specific to the Akai APC25key and is still under development. Yep, it is a 2"42 OLED, i will use it as a parameter "reminder" the 1"3 Oled is mainly for scope.

The patch is essentially based on the sync/formant phase modulation oscillators tiar/osc/SyncPM2 and the tiar/dist/SyncAlias object to add some old digital flavor.

Read full topic

@chapelierfou wrote:

I'll try to make it if I can, and if I can arrange some holidays in the West of France !

item.description:
@JeromeB wrote:

Whouaou, great work ! Please, share the patch !
Is the 2"42 OLED screen version on the picture ?

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone for Synthfest France (Nantes 7 9 june 2019)?
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

I'll try to take some pictures

The Synthfest Nantes is really great to meet people and discuss with lots of passionate synth addicts and creators, technical experts and musicians.

This year there will be lots of analog modular synths and some great early digital synth demos including a Fairlight CMI II with samples provided by JM Jarre (that he sampled and used for the Zoolook album).

Here is a short demo of on of the "Axolosynth" I will show at the SynthFest Nantes:

The matrix buttons are used to set a sequence of presets that are continuously "morphed" in a sequence... it allows a lot of cool sounds.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone for Synthfest France (Nantes 7 9 june 2019)?
item.dc:creator: @JeromeB
item.description:
@JeromeB wrote:

I regret not going there.
I'm sure your demos will expand the axoloti community.
Posts videos or photos!

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone for Synthfest France (Nantes 7 9 june 2019)?
item.dc:creator: @SmashedTransistors
item.description:
@SmashedTransistors wrote:

I will be present all three days and will present some Axoloti made synths.
I'm preparing some demo/easy to use patches so that people can easily play with them.

I will certainly bring a laptop to show people how easily the Axoloti can be patched.

Hope to see some Axoloti adepts there

Read full topic

@SmashedTransistors wrote:

Hi everyone,

I will be at the Synthfest France 2019 (Nantes friday 7 to sunday 9 june). I will bring some axoloti based stuff.

There will be a lot of great vintage synths on display : modular synths, analog synths and early digital synths (fairlight CMI II with Zoolook samples demos !)

Does other axoloti enthusiast plan to come.

synthfestfrance.com

SynthFest France 2019 | SynthFest France

L’association SynthFest France organise le festival annuel SynthFest France 2019 qui se déroulera les 7, 8 et 9 juin 2019. Ce festival rassemble depuis 2014 les passionnés de synthétiseurs et de musiques éléctroniques. Comme les années précédentes,...

See you there
